short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your Best Streams Default Search allows you to configure your default search engine.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your Best Streams Default Search is a free user-centric Chrome browser extension that lets you find all your search requests easily and accurately with custom search experience powered by Bing.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", you accept and agree to install Your Best Streams Default Search Chrome extension, set the Chrome Default Search to Your Best Streams Default Search, powered by Bing, and adhere to the Terms and Privacy Policy.

How it works:
Type preferred search term into the Google Chrome Omnibox. Your Best Streams will offer you first-rate custom search results powered by Bing.
For more technical details you can read about Google Chrome API for Google Chrome Extensions.

Visit our website at https://yourbeststreams.com/
Read more about us: https://yourbeststreams.com/about-search/
Read our Privacy Policy: https://yourbeststreams.com/privacy-policy/
Read our Terms & Conditions: https://yourbeststreams.com/terms-conditions/
Uninstall Instructions: https://yourbeststreams.com/uninstalling-a-chrome-extension/

If at any point after installing you feel that Your Best Streams Default Search is not right for you, don't worry about it! There are two simple ways to uninstall the extension.

Removal Instructions One:
Step 1: Right click on the extension in the top right corner of your browser.
Step 2: Click 'Remove'

Or

Removal Instructions Two:
Step 1: Click on the three dots/horizontal lines icon in the top right corner of your Chrome browser.
Step 2: Go to "Settings".
Step 3: On the left-hand side, click on 'Extensions'
Step 4: Find the extension that you wish to remove and click the 'Remove' button.
Step 5: The extension should be removed from your Chrome browser.
